page.title: 13A Typical Saturday
page.content: On{Saturday}I get up at 9.30am which is 2 hours later than usual.I do{house {work}with my sister Gail.Dinner is at 12 o'clock. In the afternoon I sometimes{play with my football and tennis set. Sometimes I play with my pals in the park.I usually have fish and chips for tea at 5 o'clock.Then Gail and I do the dishes. I may{watch T.V.}after this or{help my Dad}if he is working overtime. He works at Kirkton Farm and I enjoy helping him{feeding the cattle and{clipping the wool}from the sheep. I have my{supper}about 9.30 pm and {go to bed}at 10.30 pm. Before I go to bed I{brush}my teeth and{wash}my hands,face and feet. Mandy Christie P.7.
